reviews.review_msg: Don't know about other people but I had a great time with Dr. Masahiro for HSCI 336 lab. He was attentive to details and would not mind explaining certain things multiple times to make sure that you understand the materials. He was also very kind and accommodating since I was registered with CAL. I would not mind taking a lab again with him.

It was apparent the professor wants all of us to learn and will go above and beyond to ensure his students' success. The lab was very enjoyable, from the content to the lab techniques itself. The precision of lab techniques is not what is graded but the learning to why something happened or why something was off is what is important.
